spells.name: Acute Senses
spells.description: Subject gains a bonus on Perception checks.

spells.name: Blood Transcription
spells.description: Learn a spell from the target's blood.

spells.name: Ghostly Disguise
spells.description: You look like a ghost of yourself.

spells.name: Skinsend
spells.description: Animate and possess your own skin as if it were a separate creature.
